display_long_description:
Enter **Exfil Zone** alpha version, the immersive extraction-based game mode in Contractors Showdown, where every decision could mean life or death. Unlike traditional battle royale, Exfil Zone introduces a deep progression system intertwined with dynamic missions, challenging you to survive, complete objectives, and successfully extract with your hard-earned loot.
[media]

Take on missions from unique vendors, ranging from elimination contracts and reconnaissance tasks to planting trackers and resource gathering. Completing these missions builds loyalty with vendors, unlocking new weapons, gear, and upgrades to expand your arsenal. With over 50 weapons, customizable attachments, and gear like body armor, combat helmets, and night vision goggles, you can create a loadout tailored to your playstyle.
[media]

Survival is not just about firepower—manage your health with the revamped system featuring limb damage, bleeding, and scavenged medical supplies. Keep your stamina up by staying hydrated and fueled as you fight through intense raids. Gather resources to upgrade your headquarters, unlocking sections that provide game-changing advantages during future missions.
[media]

With its revamped maps, close-quarters combat zones, and high-stakes extraction gameplay, Exfil Zone offers a unique blend of strategy, progression, and adrenaline-pumping action. Will you take the risk, complete the mission, and make it out alive? The zone awaits.
[media]
